name: Worm Queen
effectText: You can Tribute Summon this card in face-up Attack Position by Tributing 1 Reptile-Type "Worm" monster. Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 Reptile-Type "Worm" monster to Special Summon from your Deck 1 Reptile-Type "Worm" monster with a Level less than or equal to the Tributed monster.
